mapper.insert: insert into comments (parent_id, user_id, post_id, content) values (#{parentId}, #{userId}, #{postId}, #{content})
mapper.select: select count(*) from comments where post_id = #{postId} and is_deleted = 'N'

select c.comment_id, c.parent_id, u.user_id, c.post_id, u.name, c.content, c.created_at as comment_created_at, c.updated_at, i.image_id, i.origin_name, i.stored_name, i.size, i.image_path, i.created_at as image_created_at from comments c inner join user u on c.user_id = u.user_id left join comment_image ci on c.comment_id = ci.comment_id left join image i on ci.image_id = i.image_id and i.is_deleted = 'N' where c.is_deleted = 'N' and c.post_id = #{postId} order by c.created_at desc;
